# progress-ring

#### Day 6


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                             | Type     | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `circleClass` | `circle-class` | The foreground color of the ring as it fills.           | `string` | `undefined` |
| `progress`    | `progress`     | The progress percentage to whole for the progress ring. | `number` | `0`         |
| `radius`      | `radius`       | The radius of the ring in pixels.                       | `number` | `20`        |
| `stroke`      | `stroke`       | The stroke width of the progress ring.                  | `number` | `2.5`       |
